name: Profile
body:
### INTRO
I'm Yuanl, The programer and Web designer. I'm living in Beijing/China. 

I use Linux since 2002 hacking happily with it until I got a MAC. Besides that, I build a NAS with FreeBSD at home that's my media server.

If you're using the GitHub you can found me at @yuanl.

### THINGS I'D DONE
* I'm hosting [my girlfriend's blog](http://sunny.yuanl.com) on [Linode VPS](http://www.linode.com) using Wordpress and Nginx.
* A OpenVPN/ipsec VPN on that server too.
* A [freshnew theme](https://github.com/yuanl/roots-child-cgs) for www.bjcgs.com which is base on [Roots theme](https://github.com/retlehs/roots). I contribute the Simplified-Chinese translation to Roots theme.

### THINGS I'M WORKING ON
* A [Flight delay information publish site](https://github.com/yuanl/flight-info) using by _China Southern Airline_ in Terminal 2 of _Beijing Capital International Airport_.
* AND [THE improved version](https://github.com/yuanl/flight) of above using [Nodejs](http://nodejs.org) + [Backbone](http://backbonejs.org) + [Mongodb](http://www.mongodb.org/). 

### OTHER THINGS I'M INTREST IN
* Huge fan of **Road cycling**.
* Photography.
* Making soap with my GF.

### Contact
Email me (yuanl.lee # gmail.com) or follow me on twitter [@yuanllee](https://twitter.com/yuanllee)

![a photo of yuanl](images/yuanl.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
